short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to automatically close the least interacted tab when number of tabs increases a threshold.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**TabTidy** is a powerful yet simple Chrome extension designed to help you manage your open tabs more efficiently. With TabTidy, you can automatically close tabs based on your usage patterns, ensuring that your browser stays organized and clutter-free.

**Key Features:**

- **Automatic Tab Management:** TabTidy keeps track of your open tabs and automatically closes the least recently used tabs when your tab count exceeds a set limit.
- **Protection for Important Tabs:** Easily protect specific tabs from being closed by marking them as "protected." These tabs will remain open, no matter how many tabs you have.
- **Customizable Settings:** Set the maximum number of tabs you want to keep open, and adjust how the extension handles your tabs based on your preferences.
- **Local Data Storage:** All tab-related information is stored locally on your device, ensuring that your data stays private and secure.

**Why Use TabTidy?**

TabTidy is perfect for users who frequently work with multiple tabs and want to maintain a clean, efficient browsing experience without losing important tabs. It's a lightweight and privacy-conscious tool that helps you stay organized without any hassle.
